headline: Stock Splits Revisited: Here's How 3 High-Profile Stocks Have Performed Since Their Splits.
summary: Nvidia has grown revenue, net income, and earnings per share around 35% over the last year.  Markets have cheered Broadcom's first-ever stock split.  Investors should blame a steep valuation for Palo Alto Networks' post-split slide.
